refsect1.title: Proposal
refsect1.para: All fields of core classes must be private.

refsect1.title: Reason
refsect1.para: The core classes, at time of writing, do not consistently use a certain access level. Some classes have public fields, others protected, or do not define the level.
All core classes have access methods, so making the fields private is the best thing to do (IMHO).
